snippet: ROTH--Gary. Beloved husband of Jody Pollack Roth. Devoted father of Gregory Roth and Marni Rubin. Adored grandfather of Emily, Nicholas, and Alexis. Devoted son-in-law of Lester Pollack and the late Arlene. Brother of Joel Roth. Fond nephew, brother-in-law and uncle. Founder and president of Seven Points Capital. Funeral Thursday, December 31st at 11am, Campbell Funeral Home (81st St.). 1/3
